content.detail: I helped the Marvel team in replacing their former Marvel HQ site with a new splash page marketing their content on an app published by StoryToys. I helped the team build the page and ensured that the rest of the site content was unpublished and redirecting to the new splash page.

images.alt: Webpage marketing Marvel HQ Published by StoryToys app, including characters featured in the app, a button to watch the trailer, and links to download the app
